entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
